articles.title: Our ancient ancestor 'Little Foot' was a creature of the trees more than 3 MILLION years ago - Daily Mail
articles.description: Little Foot's shoulder assembly shows it supported arms for hanging from trees, suggesting the structural similarities between humans and African apes are much more recent.
articles.content:
A new analysis of the upper body of famed fossil 'Little Foot,' a near-complete skeleton of a hominin that lived 3.67 million years ago, reveals she was a creature adapted to living in trees.
